================================

are included:
* [OpenGL Mathematics (GLM)](http://glm.g-truc.net/), version 0.9.9.6
* [Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL)](https://www.libsdl.org/), version 2.0.10

These libraries are released under the terms of their respective licenses, reproduced below.
